english: Many divines treat them with contempt .
chinese: 有些神学家根本就看不起他们。

english: The rev doctor was a fine old picture .
chinese: 神学博士是一幅老式的精美画像。
最近的那个神学假设是可疑的。

english: This book is not a theological book .
chinese: 这部书不是一部神学的书。

english: Theology occupied the first place among the sciences .
chinese: 神学则位于众学科之首。
神学造句挺难的，這是一个万能造句的方法

english: It avoids the intellectualism of christian theology .
chinese: 它回避宗教神学的唯理智论。

english: The theological collection was kept in a sacred place .
chinese: 神学藏书收藏于宗教机构中。

english: He routed his host's calculations by calling to the rev. doctor .
chinese: 他叫了一声神学博士，从而击溃了他主人的如意算盘。

english: He investigates theology, and metaphysics and all sorts of subjects .
chinese: 他研究神学，还有形而上学，还有各种各样的学问。

english: With an incongruousness that was characteristic, his favorite study was theology .
chinese: 由于他不调和的特性，他最喜欢研究神学。

english: Along with theology and law, medicine was usually one of the basic faculties .
chinese: 医学常常是和神学、法学并立，作为大学的基本学系。

english: Our preparations for salt ii suddenly took on a theological cast .
chinese: 我们为第二阶段限制战略武器会谈所作的准备突然带上了神学色彩。

english: I went half a dozen times to hear him preach and got very well acquainted with his theology .
chinese: 我听他布道有五、六次，对他的神学很熟悉。

english: Neither it nor his other theological verse treatises rise far above doggerel .
chinese: 跟他的其他有关神学的议论诗一样，这不比拙劣的打油诗高明多少。

english: The 1890s witnessed wholesale acceptance of the theory of evolution by liberal theologians .
chinese: 十九世纪九十年代，进化论被开明的神学家们全盘接受。
